question: Web- Wonder Women was recently making news. Consider the following statements about the initiative. 1.It was launched by the Ministry of Home affairs. 2.NGO Breakthrough and Twitter India are the associated agencies. 3.It aims to recognize the fortitude of Indian women stalwarts. Which of the above is correct?
explanation: Web Wonder Women Campaign has been launched by the Ministry of Women and Child Development, Government of India in association with the NGO Breakthrough and Twitter India.
